title: Fragments, 16th century
provenance: from the Richard Cranch Greenleaf Collection.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Component  A: Brown silk velvet, faded from violet, cut and uncut, on yellow ground; geometric pattern. Components B and C: rose-colored silk velvet, cut and uncut, on yellow ground; geometric pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: silk, velvet. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-56-102-a/c.
